title: Woman's overblouse (Sobre-huipil)
description: the embroidery (brocade) on back is likely to be teaching or practice by a child; beige ground with red and yellow warp stripes with embroidery (birds); neckline and armholes embroidered blue, red, yellow
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
